content:
CS 175: Assignment 2, Winter 2018

Instructions

  • Reading: Read the scikit-learn tutorial on working with text data. You will probably also find it useful to read through the scikit-learn tutorial on supervised learning.
  • Make a local copy of assignment2.py, read the contents, and submit your modified file (same name, assignment2.py) to the EEE assignment 2 dropbox

  • The assignment has several parts.
    • The first few parts involve writing functions, where the skeleton of the function is provided and you fill in the details.
    • The last part is some script code that calls the functions to classify sample documents, to compute classification accuracies, and so on. This part contains multiple places where you are asked to fill in code

  • Deadline: 5pm on Wednesday January 24th
